title: Ticket #1258: DAGMan $JOBID POST script argument is incorrect if RETRY is on
description: If retries are turned on for a node, and the node job fails, the $JOBID value reported to the POST script is -1.-1.
remarks:
2010-Mar-04 11:58:52 by wenger:
Hmm -- I saw this once, made some more changes to the DAG I was running, and the problem went away. I need to look into it more to see if I can reproduce it.

2011-Jan-13 15:33:27 by wenger:
I just tested this with both 7.4.4 and 7.5.5, and I wasn't able to reproduce it, so I'm going to resolve the ticket.
creator: wenger
